creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Dr and Mrs Sherman Lee
description: rocky outcroppings line shore of still water; three figures LRQ, one carrying a staff and standing on small bridge; multi-storied building behind trees at L center; larger mountains, fog, and a waterfall in background
inscription:
Signature, Inscription, and Seals

URQ: [ 文政甲申八月写 ]
markings: URC, square relief: [Unshitsu ga in]; URC, square relief: [Ryōki Kōhan??]; seal back of scroll L edge, square relief; seal back of scroll R side, square relief
signed: URC: [ 雲室道人時年七十有二 ]
title: Landscape
